General.Name: Ningbo Joy Intelligent Logistics Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Ningbo Joy Intelligent Logistics Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of recyclable packaging appliances. The company's products include turnover boxes, customized blisters, customized material racks, standard heaven and earth covers, and customized internal materials, as well as new retail series storage boxes. Its products are used in the production, circulation, transport, and storage of auto parts. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Cixi, China.
